languages.text: Warden Casteglia suffers a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, but his enemies suffer a −25% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against his attacks.
languages.original_text: Комендант Кастелья получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g}, а шанс {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонения{/g} его целей снижается на 25%.

traits.locale_text: Warden Casteglia suffers a −20 penalty to Agility, but his enemies suffer a −25% penalty to dodge against his attacks.

Warden Casteglia suffers a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, but his enemies suffer a −25% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against his attacks.

languages.text: Комендант Кастелья получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g}, а шанс {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонения{/g} его целей снижается на 25%.

Aufseher Casteglia erleidet einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −20 auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}, seine Feinde aber erleiden gegen seine Angriffe einen Abzug von −25 % auf {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Aufseher Casteglia erleidet einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −20 auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}, seine Feinde aber erleiden gegen seine Angriffe einen Abzug von −25 % auf {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g}.

languages.text: Le Gardien Casteglia subit une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} de −20 tandis que ses ennemis subissent une pénalité d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} de −25 % contre ses attaques.
languages.original_text: Warden Casteglia suffers a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, but his enemies suffer a −25% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against his attacks.

traits.locale_text: Le Gardien Casteglia subit une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} de -20 tandis que ses ennemis subissent une pénalité d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} de -25 % contre ses attaques.

languages.text: 卡斯特格利亚典狱长的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}降低20点，而他所有的敌人{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}都降低25%。{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}

traits.locale_text: 卡斯特格利亚典狱长的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}降低20点，而他所有的敌人{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}都降低25%。{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}

languages.text: El alcaide Casteglia sufre una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −20 a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}, pero sus enemigos sufren una penalización del −25 % a su {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} contra sus ataques.
languages.original_text: Warden Casteglia suffers a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, but his enemies suffer a −25% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against his attacks.

traits.locale_text: El alcaide Casteglia sufre una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de -20 a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}, pero sus enemigos sufren una penalización del −25 % a su {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} contra sus ataques.

languages.text: ワーデン・カスティーリアは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g} −20の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を負うが、一方で彼の攻撃に対する敵の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}は −25%のペナルティを負う。
